CustomField.description: Sum of Total Previous Cumulative Hours and Qualified hours for this week
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( W_C_Monday_1__c >= TODAY() , W_C_Monday_1__c <= TODAY() + 7 ) , Hours_1__c , 0 )
+
IF( AND( W_C_Monday_2__c >= TODAY() , W_C_Monday_2__c <= TODAY() + 7 ) , Hours_2__c , 0 )
+
IF( AND( W_C_Monday_3__c >= TODAY() , W_C_Monday_3__c <= TODAY() + 7 ) , Hours_3__c , 0 )
+
IF( AND( W_C_Monday_4__c >= TODAY() , W_C_Monday_4__c <= TODAY() + 7 ) , Hours_4__c , 0 )
+
Total_Cumulative_Hours__c
CustomField.label: Actual Cumulative Hours
